kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

test.name: Verify that the website is working properly.

kw.name: Given Verify that the page is successfully visible.
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Value
kw.doc: Returns the value attribute of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Value
kw.doc: Returns the value attribute of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Select Radio Button
kw.doc: Sets the radio button group ``group_name`` to ``value``.

kw.name: Radio Button Should Be Set To
kw.doc: Verifies radio button group ``group_name`` is set to ``value``.

kw.name: Select Checkbox
kw.doc: Selects the checkbox identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Select Checkbox
kw.doc: Selects the checkbox identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then Verify checkbox should be selected @{days}
Checkbox Should Be Selected
kw.doc: Verifies checkbox ``locator`` is selected/checked.

kw.name: Checkbox Should Be Selected
kw.doc: Verifies checkbox ``locator`` is selected/checked.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: List Selection Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies selection list ``locator`` has ``expected`` options selected.
kw.msg: Verifying list 'xpath://*[@id="country"]' has option [ canada ] selected.

kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

test.name: Verify that the Pagination is working properly.

kw.name: When Verify that the page is successfully visible.
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

test.name: Verify that the Search Bar is working properly.

kw.name: Given Verify that the page is successfully visible.
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then Verify Please enter text to search is visible
Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Please enter text to search.'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Dragon Ball' into text field 'xpath://*[@id="Wikipedia1_wikipedia-search-input"]'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then Verify search result of search is visible
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

test.name: Verify New Browser Window is working properly.

kw.name: Given Verify that the page is successfully visible.
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: When Click New Windows Browser button
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Then Verify New Browser Is Opened
Get Window Handles
kw.doc: Returns all child window handles of the selected browser as a list.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Switch Window
kw.doc: Switches to browser window matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Get Window Handles
kw.doc: Returns all child window handles of the selected browser as a list.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Switch Window
kw.doc: Switches to browser window matching ``locator``.

test.name: Verify JS Alerts is working properly.

kw.name: Given Verify that the page is successfully visible.
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then Verify Alert Should Be Present
Alert Should Be Present
kw.doc: Verifies that an alert is present and by default, accepts it.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Handle Alert
kw.doc: Handles the current alert and returns its message.

kw.name: Then Verify Text You pressed OK! should be visible
Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Handle Alert
kw.doc: Handles the current alert and returns its message.

kw.name: Then Verify Text You pressed Cancel! should be visible
Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text Into Alert
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into an input field in an alert.

kw.name: Then Verify Text Hello ${text}! How are you today? should be visible
kw.sourcename: Verify Text Hello ${text}! How are you today? should be visible

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element 'xpath://*[@id="demo"]' contains text 'Hello World! How are you today?'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And Input ${text} Into Alerts And Select DISMISS
kw.sourcename: Input ${text} Into Alerts And Select DISMISS

kw.name: Input Text Into Alert
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into an input field in an alert.

kw.name: Then Verify Text User cancelled the prompt. should be visible
Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element 'xpath://*[@id="demo"]' contains text 'User cancelled the prompt.'.

test.name: Verify Double Click Action is working properly.

kw.name: Given Verify that the page is successfully visible.
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of the text-input-element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And Double Click on Copy Text Button
Double Click Element
kw.doc: Double clicks the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then Verify text text from Field1 copied into Field2.
Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

test.name: Verify Drag And Drop / Slider Action

kw.name: Given Verify that the page is successfully visible.
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Drag And Drop
kw.doc: Drags the element identified by ``locator`` into the ``target`` element.

kw.name: Then Verify Action Drag And Drop is successfull
Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: When Drag Slider in X axis ${side} px
kw.sourcename: Drag Slider in X axis ${side} px

kw.name: Drag And Drop By Offset
kw.doc: Drags the element identified with ``locator`` by ``xoffset/yoffset``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Then Verify Slider in X axis ${side} px
kw.sourcename: Verify Slider in X axis ${side} px

kw.name: Get Horizontal Position
kw.doc: Returns the horizontal position of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Given Verify that the page is successfully visible.
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: When Enter name in frame with ${user_data}[name]
Select Frame
kw.doc: Sets frame identified by ``locator`` as the current frame.

kw.name: And Enter date in frame with ${date}
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

Click Element

kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
